summary.span: 取得或設定 ，當控制項中的項目顯示為小圖示時使用。

span.span: Gets or sets the to use when displaying items as small icons in the control.

value.span: ，其中包含將 屬性設定為 時所用的圖示。

span.span: An that contains the icons to use when the property is set to .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定物件，其中包含顯示小圖示的項目時所要使用的圖示 (當以外屬性設定為任何值)。The property allows you to specify an object that contains icons to use when displaying items with small icons (when the property is set to any value other than ). 控制項可以接受的任何圖形格式控制項支援時顯示圖示。The control can accept any graphics format that the control supports when displaying icons. 控制項不限於.ico 檔案。The control is not limited to .ico files. 一次指派給屬性，您可以將每個屬性中中適當的映像的索引位置的控制項。Once an is assigned to the property, you can set the property of each in the control to the index position of the appropriate image in the . 圖示的大小所指定屬性。The size of the icons for the is specified by the property. 因為可以指定只能有一個索引屬性，物件中指定和屬性應該有相同的索引位置，如顯示的影像。Because only one index can be specified for the property, the objects specified in the and properties should have the same index positions for the images to display. 例如，如果屬性設為 0 時，要用於小型和大型圖示影像應該會在相同的索引位置中指定的物件和屬性。For example, if the property of a is set to 0, the images to use for both small and large icons should be at the same index position in the objects specified in the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 當索引鍵指定映像時，您仍然需要放置在其各自的影像清單中，相同的索引位置的小型和大型影像的版本。When the images are specified with keys, you still need to place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists. 檢視之間切換時，一份清單中的映像的索引位置用來找出影像中的其他清單中，不論所指定的金鑰值。When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified. 若要設定顯示大圖示的項目時所要使用 (當屬性設定為)，使用屬性。To set the to use when displaying items with large icons (when the property is set to ), use the property. 如果您想要使用影像來顯示項目狀態，請使用屬性。If you want to use images to display item state, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立控制項具有三個所指定的物件和三個針對每個項目指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您已加入的程式碼並呼叫從建構函式或在表單上的另一個方法範例中所建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像命名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. summary.span: 為清單檢視中的項目排序。

span.span: Sorts the items of the list view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常使用排序的項目屬性排序的項目文字的項目。Typically items are sorted using the property, which sorts items based on the item text. 若要自訂排序次序，您必須撰寫實作的類別介面，並設定該類別物件的屬性。To customize the sort order, you must write a class that implements the interface and set the property to an object of that class. 這非常有用，例如，當您想要排序文字子項目的項目。This is useful, for example, when you want to sort items by subitem text. 如需執行的項目手動排序的詳細資訊，請參閱範例的屬性。For more information on performing manual sorting of items, see the example for the property. 如果以外屬性設定為值或屬性設定，並加入項目時自動排序清單。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted automatically when items are added. 標籤文字變更時，不會自動排序項目。Items are not sorted automatically when the label text changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定是否有項目會按照控制項。The property allows you to specify whether or not items are sorted in the control. 根據預設，不執行排序。By default, no sorting is performed. 當屬性設定為或中的項目會自動依字母順序遞增排序 (當此屬性設定為) 或遞減字母順序 (時屬性設定為)。When the property is set to or , the items in the are sorted automatically in ascending alphabetical order (when the property is set to ) or descending alphabetical order (when the property is set to ). 您可以使用這個屬性，來自動排序項目會顯示在您控制項，讓使用者更輕鬆地尋找項目，可用的項目數量龐大時。You can use this property to automatically sort items that are displayed in your control to make it easier for users to find items when a large number of items are available. 如果您想要執行排序，而不使用您自己的項目屬性，請使用屬性結合方法。If you want to perform your own item sorting instead of using the property, use the property in combination with the method. 如果以外屬性設定為值或屬性設定，則會自動排序清單項目加入時。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted automatically when items is added. 標籤文字變更時，不會自動排序項目。Items are not sorted automatically when the label text changes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立控制項具有三個所指定的物件和三個針對每個項目指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您已加入的程式碼並呼叫從建構函式或在表單上的另一個方法範例中所建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像命名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定，其中包含要用來表示應用程式專屬的狀態中的項目影像控制項。The property allows you to specify an that contains images to use to represent an application-specific state of an item in a control. 狀態影像會顯示項目圖示的左邊。State images are displayed to the left of an icon for the item. 您可以使用狀態的影像，例如已核對及未核取核取方塊，以指出應用程式定義的項目狀態。You can use state images, such as checked and unchecked check boxes, to indicate application-defined item states. 狀態影像會顯示在所有檢視的控制項。State images are visible in all views of the control. 如果中指定屬性和屬性設定為`true`，在 0 和 1 中的索引位置的映像而不是核取方塊會顯示。If an is specified in the property and the property is set to `true`, the images at index positions 0 and 1 in the are displayed instead of the check box. 而不是未檢查的核取方塊，顯示的影像的索引位置 0，而不是已核取核取方塊會顯示的索引位置 1 的影像。The image at index position 0 is displayed instead of the unchecked check box, and the image at index position 1 is displayed instead of the checked check box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會控制的大小，並排顯示時屬性設定為。This property controls the size of tiles when the property is set to . 設定這個屬性是可用來防止換太長，無法在同一行顯示子項目的文字時。Setting this property is useful to prevent line-wrapping when subitem text is too long to be displayed on a single line. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用並排顯示功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use the tiling feature. 在範例中，並排顯示檢視會顯示代表書籍項目。In the example, the tile view displays items that represent books. 每個項目會顯示為磚，其中包含書籍、 標題、 作者，以及發行年份的圖示。Each item is shown as a tile containing an icon of a book, the title, the author, and the publication year. 工作的範例程式碼，您必須包含相同的目錄與範例中名為 Book.ico 的圖示檔案。For the example code to work, you must include an icon file named Book.ico in the same directory as the example. 若要查看不含圖示檢視中，標記為註解的線條與相關的磚物件。To see the tile view without icons, comment out the lines relating to the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有零 (0) 的索引位置的項目一開始是在頂端控制項。Initially, the item with the index position of zero (0) is at the top of the control. 如果控制項內容捲動以外，另一個項目可能會在控制項的頂端。If the control contents are scrolled, a different item can be at the top of the control. 您可以使用這個屬性來表示，或判斷哪一個項目會顯示在頂端控制項。You can use this property to indicate or determine which item is visible at the top of the control. 值屬性將不一定會保存，根據所需的最上層項目是清單檢視中的位置。The value of the property will not always persist, depending on where the desired top item is in the list view. 顯示在項目數目控制項在任何時間取決於 [清單] 檢視的高度和它所包含的項目大小。The number of items visible in a control at any time depends on the height of the list view and the size of the items it contains. 如果項目數目超過 [清單] 檢視的高度，項目會繼續到多個頁面，使用者可以捲動。If the items exceed the height of the list view, the items will continue onto multiple pages, which the user can scroll through. 如果您設定屬性中的最後一頁的項目，此項目會自動捲動到檢視; 不過，會設定為實際的最後一頁上方項目。If you set the property to an item in the last page of the , the item will automatically be scrolled into view; however, will be set to the actual top item of the last page. 若要確保特定項目控制項的可見區域 （但不是一定在上方的位置） 中，使用方法。To ensure that a specific item is in the visible region of the control (but not necessarily in the top position), use the method. > [!NOTE] > 設定此屬性沒有任何作用屬性值是`false`。Setting this property has no effect when the property value is `false`. > > 設定這個屬性的版本中不支援[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0 以前版本。Setting this property is not supported in versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] prior to version 2.0. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何重設的樣式使用物件的子項目屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates resetting the style of a object's subitems through the use of the property and the method. 若要執行範例時，貼入下列程式碼包含名為按鈕的表單`Button1`呼叫`InitializeListView`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理常式。To run the example, paste the following code into a form containing a button named `Button1` and call the `InitializeListView` method in the form's constructor or event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要變更控制[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0 啟用自訂的狀態設為指出項目是 checked 或 unchecked 或處於不定狀態的映像。Changes to the control in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 enable custom state images to be set to indicate whether an item is checked or unchecked or in an indeterminate state. 這項功能，加上[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0 具有不同的行為與.NET Framework 1.1。With the addition of this feature, the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 has different behavior than the .NET Framework 1.1. 如果您已經建立的應用程式中的行為而定， [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 版中，確定屬性設定為`true`，這是預設值。If you have created applications that depend on the behavior in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1, be sure that the property is set to `true`, which is the default value. 若要充分利用自訂狀態映像，設定至`false`。In order to fully take advantage of custom state images, set to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]設計工具中，屬性將設定為`false`。If you are using the [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] designer, the property will be set to `false`.

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項中項目的顯示方式。

span.span: Gets or sets how items are displayed in the control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定的顯示類型控制項以顯示項目使用。The property allows you to specify the type of display the control uses to display items. 您可以設定屬性來顯示每個項目與大型或小型圖示，或以垂直清單顯示項目。You can set the property to display each item with large or small icons or display items in a vertical list. 豐富的選項是詳細資料檢視中，可讓您檢視項目，但不是只針對每個項目指定任何子項目。The richest option is the details view, which allows you to view not only the items but any subitems specified for each item. 每個項目在方格中，會顯示每個項目垂直列和資料行，具有資料行標頭中顯示每個項目的子項目。Each item is displayed in a grid, with each item listed vertically and the subitems for each item displayed in a column, with column headers. 詳細資料檢視會顯示資料庫資訊給使用者的絕佳方式。The details view is a perfect way to display database information to a user. Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003，您也可以並排圖形和文字資訊平衡，以顯示您所選擇的子項目資訊以及大型圖示顯示項目。With Windows XP and Windows Server 2003, you can also display items as tiles that balance graphical and textual information by showing a large icon along with subitem information of your choosing. 若要啟用並排顯示檢視，您的應用程式必須呼叫方法。To enable tile view, your application must call the method. 小型影像檢視會顯示圖示和文字資訊與每個項目右邊的圖示。The small-image view displays each item with an icon and textual information to the right of the icon. 大型影像檢視會顯示圖示和文字資訊圖示下的每個項目。The large-image view displays each item with an icon and textual information below the icon. 所指定的影像清單圖示的大小屬性如或屬性。The size of the icons for the image list is specified by the property of the for the or properties. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用多個映像清單，針對小型和大型圖示檢視中，與控制項，您應該將放置小型和大型版本在相同的影像索引中其各自的影像清單的位置。If you are using multiple image lists, for small and large icon view, with a control, you should place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists. 檢視之間切換時，一份清單中的映像的索引位置用來找出影像中的其他清單中，不論所指定的金鑰值。When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified. 中的屬性，大部分控制會影響在不同的檢視行為或顯示的方式。Most of the properties in the control affect how the different views behave or are displayed. 某些屬性會影響項目的檢視才會有用時屬性設定為特定值，有些則是在所有檢視很有用。Some properties that affect the views of the items are only useful when the property is set to a specific value, while others are useful in all views. 比方說，這類屬性和才有用時屬性設定為，雖然和屬性可用於所有檢視。For example, properties such as and are only useful when the property is set to , while the and properties are useful in all views. 下表顯示一些成員以及中是有效的檢視。The following table shows some of the members and the views they are valid in. |ListView 成員ListView member|檢視View| |---------------------|----------| | 屬性 property| 或 or | | 屬性 property| 或 or | | 方法 method|| ||以外的所有模式 All views except | | 屬性 property| 或 or | | 事件 event|| | 方法 method|、 或 , , or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 屬性 property|以外的所有模式 All views except | | 屬性 property|| | 屬性 property|、 或 , , or | 您可以使用屬性提供不同的應用程式中的資料檢視，或鎖定特定的檢視，以利用該檢視的優點。You can use the property to provide different views of data in your application, or to lock a specific view to utilize that view's benefits. 例如，屬性通常會設定為因為詳細資料檢視提供的檢視選項無法使用其他檢視中的數字。For example, the property is often set to because the details view provides a number of viewing options not available in the other views. > [!NOTE] > 如果您控制項沒有指定任何資料行標頭，而且您設定屬性、控制項不會顯示任何項目。If your control does not have any column headers specified and you set the property to , the control will not display any items. 如果您控制項沒有指定任何資料行標頭，而且您設定屬性、控制項將不會顯示任何子項目。If your control does not have any column headers specified and you set the property to , the control will not display any subitems. 並排顯示檢視會顯示每個項目大圖示右邊的向左和文字資訊。The tile view displays each item with a large icon on the left and textual information on the right. 文字資訊是由後面接著子項目的項目標籤所組成。The textual information consists of the item label followed by subitems. 根據預設，會顯示第一個子項目，它會對應至項目標籤。By default, only the first subitem is displayed, which corresponds to the item label. 若要顯示其他子項目，您必須加入物件加入至集合。To display additional subitems, you must add objects to the collection. 在磚中的每一個子項目會對應到資料行標頭。Each subitem in the tile corresponds to a column header. 若要控制顯示哪一個子項目和顯示它們的順序，您必須設定每個項目的屬性和每個標頭的屬性。To control which subitems are displayed and the order in which they are displayed, you must set the property for each item and the property for each header. 您可以再新增、 移除和重新排列中的標頭來達成所需的結果的集合。You can then add, remove, and rearrange headers in the collection to achieve the desired result. 若要控制並排顯示檢視中的圖格的大小，請設定屬性。To control the size of the tiles in the tile view, set the property. 這是可用來防止換子項目的文字同一行太長時。This is useful to prevent line-wrapping when subitem text is too long for a single line. 如需並排顯示檢視的範例，請參閱屬性。For an example of the tile view, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 雖然資料行只會顯示在詳細資料檢視中，不含資料行的標頭的子項目不會顯示在 詳細資料檢視 或 並排顯示檢視中。Although columns are only displayed in the details view, subitems without column headers will not display in either the details view or the tile view. 並排顯示檢視是僅可在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003，當您的應用程式呼叫方法。The tile view is available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. 在舊版作業系統中，任何與並排顯示檢視相關的程式碼都無效，而且 控制項會顯示在大圖示檢視中。On earlier operating systems, any code related to the tile view has no effect, and the control displays in the large icon view. 如此一來，並排顯示檢視所依賴的任何程式碼可能無法正確運作。As a result, any code that depends on the tile view might not work correctly. 您可能會想要加入程式碼，判斷是否可以使用，並排顯示檢視，並提供無法使用時的替代功能。You might want to include code that determines whether tile view is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，當您使用主控描繪自訂外觀並排顯示檢視中的項目，您可能要使用繪圖程式碼適用於在大型圖示檢視時不支援並排顯示檢視的作業系統上執行。For example, when you use owner drawing to customize the appearance of items in the tile view, you might want to use drawing code appropriate to the large icon view when running on operating systems that do not support the tile view. 並排顯示檢視功能是由相同的文件庫提供作業系統主題功能提供。The tile view feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要檢查此程式庫的可用性，請呼叫方法多載，並傳入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立控制項具有三個所指定的物件和三個針對每個項目指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您已加入的程式碼並呼叫從建構函式或在表單上的另一個方法範例中所建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像命名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不是處於虛擬模式，就會發生事件。If the is not in virtual mode, the event will occur. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性`true`放進入虛擬模式。Setting the property to `true` puts the into virtual mode. 在虛擬模式中，一般集合是未使用。In Virtual mode, the normal collection is unused. 相反地，物件會以動態方式建立為需要它們。Instead, objects are created dynamically as the requires them. 虛擬模式非常適合在許多情況下。Virtual mode can be useful under many circumstances. 如果物件必須先填入非常大量的集合，已在記憶體中，從建立每個項目可以是不必要的物件。If a object must be populated from a very large collection already in memory, creating a object for each entry can be wasteful. 在虛擬模式中，會建立所需的項目。In virtual mode, only the items required are created. 在其他情況下，值物件可能會需要經常重新計算，如此一來整個集合將會產生無法接受的效能。In other cases, the values of the objects may need to be recalculated frequently, and doing this for the whole collection would produce unacceptable performance. 在虛擬模式中，會計算的必要項目。In virtual mode, only the required items are calculated. 若要使用的虛擬模式，您必須處理事件，每次，就會引發需要項目。In order to use virtual mode, you must handle the event, which is raised every time the requires an item. 這個事件處理常式應建立所屬的指定索引處的物件。This event handler should create the object that belongs at the specified index. 此外，屬性必須設定為虛擬清單的大小。In addition, the property must be set to the size of the virtual list. 處理事件可讓在虛擬模式中進行搜尋。Handling the event enables searching in virtual mode. 如果未處理此事件，和方法會傳回`null`。If this event is not handled, the and methods will return `null`. 您可以處理事件，以維護的快取物件。You can handle the event in order to maintain a cache of objects. 如果計算或查詢建立物件是高度耗費資源，維護快取可改善效能。If the calculation or lookup to create a object is expensive, maintaining a cache can improve performance. 如果屬性設定為，值將會自動變更為時設`true`。If the property is set to , the value will automatically be changed to when is set to `true`. 在虛擬模式中，集合已停用。In virtual mode, the collection is disabled. 嘗試存取它導致。Attempting to access it results in an . 也是如此的集合和集合。The same is true of the collection and the collection. 如果您想要擷取的已選取或核取的項目，使用和集合改為。If you want to retrieve the selected or checked items, use the and collections instead. ## Examples 這個範例將示範簡單內容的第一次一萬個方塊。This example illustrates a simple whose contents are the first ten thousand squares. 它會處理搜尋，並為了提高效能使用快取。It handles searching and uses a cache for increased performance.
